ModMetaData.name: Rimnosis - SFW
ModMetaData.author: WolfoftheWest
ModMetaData.description:
Non-NSFW Version
This is a standalone hypnosis mod that allows you to change your colonist's minds (change their traits, and maybe add skills) There will be varying types of hypnosis that can be researched, such as crystal necklaces and drugs being a tribal method This is unlikely to be balanced, but I will attempt to make the process slow and require multiple sessions to be permanant
Includes plugins to Religions of the Rim 2.0
If you want to help motivate me to keep this mod alive, my patreon is: https://www.patreon.com/WolfoftheWest
